# nautobot Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    nautobot = {
      source = "nautobot/nautobot"
    }
  }
}
provider "nautobot" {
  // url   = "https://demo.nautobot.com/api/"
  // token = "aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `token` (String, Sensitive)
- `url` (String)
